subject: Re: [junit] Cannot see test summary report
msgSnippet: If you re lucky, there may be maven experts on this list, but you may also want to ask on a maven forum.  Good luck, David Saff
messageBody:
If you're lucky, there may be maven experts on this list, but you may
also want to ask on a maven forum. Good luck,

David Saff

On Mon, Nov 10, 2008 at 3:35 PM, irene smile <ssmile73@...> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> I am new JUnit.
>
> I am executing JUnit tests through maven. I see result text files for each
> ..java file that has @Test methods.
>
> However there is no summary of how many tests were executed, passed or
> failed.
>
> How and where can I see a summary test execution report?
>
> Thanks!
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>
